thread.title: Pompeo teases North Korea sanctions relief

title: Pompeo teases North Korea sanctions relief
text:
Pompeo teases North Korea sanctions relief 2:40pm IST - 01:16
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Sunday that the U.S. could potentially provide North Korea with sanctions relief if it completely ends its nuclear program, and will allow private investors to help build an economy to rival South Korea. Justin Mitchell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Sunday that the U.S. could potentially provide North Korea with sanctions relief if it completely ends its nuclear program, and will allow private investors to help build an economy to rival South Korea. Justin Mitchell reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L1eblc
